Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- 3rd Justice Court

Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition

Summary:  Levy and collection of a 3.0 mills property tax within the Parish of Ascension, Louisiana, beginning with the tax collection for the year 2009, and annually thereafter, to and including the year 2028, to provide funds to the Parish to be used entirely and exclusively to acquire, improve, expand and equip the Lamar-Dixon Exposition Center, and to pay the operation and maintenance costs and expenses in connection therewith, and authorizing the avails or proceeds of said tax to be funded into bonds to acquire, improve, expand and equip the Lamar-Dixon Exposition Center.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Ascension, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Louisiana Constitution of 1974, as amended, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect, and adopt an ordinance providing for such levy and collection, of a special ad valorem tax of 3.0 mills on the dollar of assessed valuation on all property subject to taxation within the boundaries of the Parish (the "Tax") (an estimated $2,100,000 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for the entire year), beginning with the tax collection for the year 2009, and annually thereafter, to and including the year 2028, and shall said Tax (after paying reasonable and necessary expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), be used to provide funds to the Parish to be used entirely and exclusively to acquire, improve, expand and equip the Lamar-Dixon Exposition Center located within the boundaries of the Parish, and to pay the operation and maintenance costs and expenses in connection therewith, and authorizing the avails or proceeds of the Tax to be funded into bonds for the purpose of acquiring, improving, expanding and equipping the Lamar-Dixon Exposition Center, to the extent and in the manner permitted by the laws of the State of Louisiana?
